fileName: SR customers comm edms Sept 25- First_EDM.html
extractedText: Emirates NBD Additional details required for your recently processed payment Additional details required for your recently processed payment Dear Customer, We’ve processed your recent payment under reference number [XXXXX] . To ensure that your future payments continue to be processed smoothly and in line with regulatory requirements, we need some additional documents and/or details from you. Please provide the required information within [X] days of receiving this message. This will avoid any d

suggestions: تصحيح الأخطاء الإملائية المذكورة لتعزيز الاحترافية.
